textAfterTable: Directions: Location of the sledding hill is at the Conneaut Township Park Bluffs. Comments: It is a rolling hill and there are areas with smooth slopes as well. Ample parking available if the gates are open to the park. When gates are closed, there is a church parking lot close by that people use. You can get a lot of air off some of the rolling hill areas so be careful. Disclaimer: The webmaster of SledRiding.com is in no way responsible for trespassing (due to false information) and/or injury or death of any person or persons on any hills listed on this website. Go sledding at your own risk. With that said, check out the snow sleds here! BACK TO TOP County: Blue Earth City: Mankato Property: Public Permission: Yes Designated Sledding Area: Yes Turf: Grass Texture: Smooth & Bumpy Crowds: Some
